question: Which country announced to restrict promotion of unhealthy food from April 2022?
explanation:
The United Kingdom recently announced several measures to tackle obesity and improve public health in the country.
As a part of the plan, the Government is to ban “buy one get one free” promotions for the food products that are high in fat, sugar or salt. Free refills of sugary soft drinks in restaurants will also be banned from April 2022. This has been announced amid rising concerns over increase in obesity.
